summary.p: 8 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 63; Qurʾānic Text: Q 45:19-46:18; 10 lines per page; Dimensions: 335 x 235mm; Script style: kūfī D.I.
The fragment Marcel 62 (NLR) belongs to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 63
8 fol. 235×335 mm (1.43). Support: thin transparent parchment, rigid, of yellowish color. Writing material: black ink.
Collation: one quire, all sheets are bifolia.
I: H1F H2F H3F H4F / F5H F6H F7H F8H

Text layout: 148/150×235/240 mm (1.6), 10 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: D I, horizontal elements of some letters are strongly stretched. Diacritics: diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text. Vocalization: red round dots.

Verse markers: for groups of five verses – golden letter ﻪ (hā); for groups of ten verses –round medallions surrounded with red and green dots (type 2.A.II) in the text line in gold and colors, with the inscribed verse numbers signified by letters according to the abjad system (ق – fol. 1r, ل – fol. 3v, ي – fol. 7r).
Title of surah 46 written in gold: الاحقاف ثلثون و اربع آية (fol. 4v).
Stitching: threads are preserved in the punctures of the fold.

Inscriptions: numbers of surahs in Roman numerals and the verse numbers in Arabic numerals are inscribed in ink on the upper margin of fol. 1r, 3v, 4r–5r, 8v; some of the verse numbers also inscribed in the text; number of surah 46 inscribed o the right margin of fol. 4v next to the title.

Defects: dark stains on fol. 1 and 5–8; margins slighty damaged probably by fire and rodents and have deteriorated; in some places text from the opposite page has imprinted; ink has partly peeled off on some pages.
Old accession numbers: B. 40 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Contents:
Fol. 1r–4v. Surah 45, verses 18(19)-36(37)*. Incipit: [الظالمين] بعضهم.
Fol. 4v–8v. Surah 46, verses 1(1)-17(18). Explicit: أولئك [الذين حق] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Marcel 62 (NLR)."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
